outline:
1. heel, rear, footprint, hinder part, hoof, rear of a troop, footstep
    1. heel
    2. mark of heel, footprint
    3. hinder part, rear
kjv_def: heel, (horse-) hoof, last, lier in wait (by mistake for H6120 (עָקֵב)), (foot-) step.
strongs_def: a heel (as protuberant); hence, a track; figuratively, the rear (of an army)
